verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is my <S%H5771>iniquity?<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is my <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> that he <S%H1245>seeks<s%> my <S%H5315>life?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, God <S%H2486>forbid;<s%> you shall not <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> either <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6996>small,<s%> but that he will <S%H1540>show<s%> it me: and <S%H4069>why<s%> should my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> from me? it is not so.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H5750>moreover,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Your <S%H1>father<s%> certainly <S%H3045>knows<s%> that I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let not <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he be <S%H6087>grieved:<s%> but <S%H199>truly<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> and as your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> there is but a <S%H6587>step<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4100>Whatever<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H559>desires,<s%> I will even <S%H6213>do<s%> it for you.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> is the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon,<s%> and I should not fail to <S%H3427>sit<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H398>meat:<s%> but let me <S%H7971>go,<s%> that I may <S%H5641>hide<s%> myself in the <S%H7704>field<s%> to the <S%H7992>third<s%> day at <S%H6153>even.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> at all <S%H6485>miss<s%> me, then <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> earnestly <S%H7592>asked<s%> leave of me that he might <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> his <S%H5892>city:<s%> for there is a <S%H3117>yearly<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>family.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> It is <S%H2896>well;<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall have <S%H7965>peace:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> he be very <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> then be <S%H3045>sure<s%> that <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H3615>determined<s%> by him.

Therefore you shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for you have <S%H935>brought<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with you: notwithstanding, <S%H518>if<s%> there be in me <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%> me <S%H859>yourself;<s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> should you <S%H935>bring<s%> me to your <S%H1>father?<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2486>Far<s%> be it from you: for <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> certainly that <S%H7451>evil<s%> were <S%H3615>determined<s%> by my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> on you, then would not I <S%H5046>tell<s%> it you?

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> me? <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H176>if<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> you <S%H7186>roughly?<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H3318>go<s%> out into the <S%H7704>field.<s%> And they <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H8147>both<s%> of them into the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I have <S%H2713>sounded<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> about to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> any <S%H6256>time,<s%> or the <S%H7992>third<s%> day, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if there be <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and I <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> not to you, and <S%H1540>show<s%> it you;

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> and <S%H3254>much<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan:<s%> but <S%H3588>if<s%> it <S%H3190>please<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to do you <S%H7451>evil,<s%> then I will <S%H1540>show<s%> it you, and <S%H7971>send<s%> you away, that you may <S%H1980>go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with you, as he has <S%H1961>been<s%> with my <S%H1>father.<s%>
And you shall not only <S%H518>while<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> I <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6213>show<s%> me the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I <S%H4191>die<s%> not:

But also you shall not <S%H3772>cut<s%> off your <S%H2617>kindness<s%> from my <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> no, not when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

So <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> saying, Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> even <S%H1245>require<s%> it at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> caused <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> because he <S%H160>loved<s%> him: for he <S%H157>loved<s%> him as he <S%H160>loved<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> is the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon:<s%> and you shall be <S%H6485>missed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> your <S%H4186>seat<s%> will be <S%H6485>empty.<s%>

And when you have stayed <S%H8027>three<s%> days, then you shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3966>quickly,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you did <S%H5641>hide<s%> yourself when the <S%H4639>business<s%> was in hand, and shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> by the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H237>Ezel.<s%>
And I will <S%H3384>shoot<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> on the <S%H6654>side<s%> thereof, as though I <S%H7971>shot<s%> at a <S%H4307>mark.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H5288>lad,<s%> saying, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> out the <S%H2671>arrows.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H559>expressly<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are on <S%H2007>this<s%> side of you, <S%H3947>take<s%> them; then <S%H935>come<s%> you: for there is <S%H7965>peace<s%> to you, and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1697>hurt;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> to the <S%H5958>young<s%> <S%H5958>man,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H1973>beyond<s%> you; <S%H3212>go<s%> your <S%H3212>way:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> you away.
And as touching the <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you and I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H996>between<s%> you and me for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5641>hid<s%> himself in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and when the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> was <S%H1961>come,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> him down to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>meat.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H4186>seat,<s%> as at other <S%H6471>times,<s%> even on a <S%H4186>seat<s%> by the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> by <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H6485>empty.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> not <S%H3972>any<s%> thing that <S%H3117>day:<s%> for he <S%H559>thought,<s%> <S%H4745>Something<s%> has <S%H4745>befallen<s%> him, he is not <S%H2889>clean;<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> he is not <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> which was the <S%H8145>second<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H6485>empty:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> not the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> to <S%H3899>meat,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H8543>yesterday,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> to <S%H3117>day?<s%>
And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> earnestly <S%H7592>asked<s%> leave of me to go to <S%H1035>Bethlehem:<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me <S%H7971>go,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you; for our <S%H4940>family<s%> has a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and my <S%H251>brother,<s%> he has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me to be there: and <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> let me <S%H4422>get<s%> <S%H4422>away,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H251>brothers.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H935>comes<s%> not to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H7979>table.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, You <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H5753>perverse<s%> <S%H4780>rebellious<s%> woman, do not I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you have <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> to your own <S%H1322>confusion,<s%> and to the <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of your <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness?<s%>

For as <S%H3117>long<s%> as the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H2425>lives<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> you shall not be <S%H3559>established,<s%> nor your <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%> Why <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> him to me, for he shall surely <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>Why<s%> shall he be <S%H4191>slain?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> has he <S%H6213>done?<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2904>cast<s%> a <S%H2595>javelin<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> him to <S%H5221>smite<s%> him: whereby <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that it was <S%H3615>determined<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

So <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> from the <S%H7979>table<s%> in <S%H2750>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>meat<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month:<s%> for he was <S%H6087>grieved<s%> for <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had done him <S%H3637>shame.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out into the <S%H7704>field<s%> at the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> with <S%H1732>David,<s%> and a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>lad<s%> with him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>lad,<s%> <S%H7323>Run,<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> out <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3384>shoot.<s%> And as the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> he <S%H3384>shot<s%> an <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H5674>beyond<s%> him.

And when the <S%H5288>lad<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> had <S%H3384>shot,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H311>after<s%> the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is not the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> you?

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H311>after<s%> the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> Make <S%H4120>speed,<s%> <S%H2363>haste,<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> not. And <S%H3129>Jonathan's<s%> <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H3950>gathered<s%> up the <S%H2678>arrows,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to his <S%H113>master.<s%>
But the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not <S%H3972>any<s%> thing: <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> the <S%H1697>matter.<s%>
And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H3627>artillery<s%> to his <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H935>carry<s%> them to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And as soon as the <S%H5288>lad<s%> was <S%H935>gone,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> out of a place <S%H681>toward<s%> the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times:<s%> and they <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1431>exceeded.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> for as much as we have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H996>between<s%> me and you, and <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H2233>seed<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%> And he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>departed:<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
